item.title: Vectorization in Python
item.description: body { text-align: justify} In deep learing we often deal with large data sets. It is important to run the code quickly because otherwise the code might take a long time to get the results. That is why perform vectorization has become a key skill. For example in logistic regression we need to to compute w transpose x in a non-vectorized implementation we can use the following code:
